enable = bw.wire.Wire()
input_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_3 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_4 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_2 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_3 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_4 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_5 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_6 = bw.wire.Wire()
output_7 = bw.wire.Wire()
input_bus = bw.wire.Bus4(input_1, input_2, input_3, input_4)
output_bus = bw.wire.BusSevenSegmentDisplay(output_1, output_2, output_3,
    output_4, output_5, output_6, output_7)
a = bw.signal.SevenSegmentConverter(enable, input_bus, output_bus)
enable.value = 0
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
enable.value = 0
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 0
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 0
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 0
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 0
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 0)
enable.value = 1
input_1.value = 1
input_2.value = 1
input_3.value = 1
input_4.value = 1
assert output_bus.wire_values == (0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 0)
print(a.__doc__)
print(a)
a(enable=1, input_bus=(0, 0, 0, 0), output_bus=None)
assert output_bus.wire_values == (1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
